meta.name: description
meta.content: Welcome to the online home of the Glendale School District, located in Flinton, Pennsylvania. At Glendale we are committed to providing a challenging and innovative curriculum that fulfills students' needs, interests, and abilities.

div.p: Information about the COVID-19 virus continues to be widely reported by the media. The matter is certainly complex, and none of us can predict the likely duration and full impact of the virus. Read more >>>

You can get no-cost, in-home internet for up to two months during the new coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak if you qualify for certain low-income internet programs or have a student living in your household. Read more >>>
Our school social worker will be holding regular office hours to support students and families. Read more >>>

div.b: Wolf Administration Confirms Two Presumptive Positive Cases of COVID-19

div.p: Governor Tom Wolf confirmed the first two presumptive positive cases of 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) in Pennsylvania and reminded residents that the commonwealth is prepared to respond to community spread of this virus. Read more >>>
Dear Glendale Family,

I hope everyone is doing well during this difficult time. Please continue to keep your family safe. This pandemic is like nothing any of us have seen before. It continues to create unexpected challenges on a daily basis. Read more >>>

div.b: Should You Be at School Today?

div.p: It is up to everyone to protect each other from infectious diseases. Before attending school, think again if you have any symptoms of illness. Read more >>>
We are now using a Big Teams website to help you stay updated on all of our junior high and high school athletics events. Read more >>>
We welcome and invite you to become a volunteer for the Glendale School District. Read more >>>

div.b: A student is never an interruption of our work. He or she is the purpose of our work.

div.p: Welcome to the online home of the Glendale School District, located in Flinton, Pennsylvania! We are excited to see your interest in our school. At Glendale we are committed to providing a challenging and innovative curriculum that fulfills students' needs, interests, and abilities.

We invite you to learn more about our district and the administration that makes it all possible. If you can’t find the answer to your question, check out our FAQ page or District Newsroom. And of course, you are always welcome to give us call!
We are now on Facebook and Instagram! Get updated information daily about events and activities. Search for Glendale School District.
Dear Glendale Community,

As your partner in education, I share your commitment to our district’s mission to create a “positive climate in which all students will develop the academic, technological, and social skills necessary to function successfully as citizens in our ever-changing global society.”

Our faculty and staff continue to put the students at the forefront of what we do each and every day. We have a dedicated and caring staff that is committed to the students and families we serve. Knowing we will face challenges along the way, we nonetheless look at those challenges as an opportunity to improve and grow.

Glendale is a special place of which we all can be proud. I see the thoughtful and compassionate ways our teachers and staff interact with our students. I see the great pride and engagement of our parents and community members. I see it in the passion our students express. There is a great sense of pride and purpose at Glendale that fulfills all of us!

We are fortunate to have a community and a board of education that support our school district. We are grateful to our highly qualified teachers who care for and educate our students. The remarkable contributions of community members, parents, students, staff, and administration are essential to our sustained growth and development as a district.
Thank you for your continued support and cooperation as we continue our journey together!
Edward G. DiSabato
